documentation.author: Chirayu Patel
documentation.purpose: To alert end user of Iodine Contrast allergy prior to exam
documentation.explanation: Alert prompted on either 1) Iodine Allergy or 2) Field in Rad orders (Iodine Allergy) is "Yes" --- only Rad orders with OEF: RadContrast/RadContrast Special included

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INC_ADDL_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2 for orders in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_HTML_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert with title OPT_TITLE from html file HTML_FILE with parameters OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_OVERRIDE_DEFAULT, OPT_PROBLEMS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_PROBLEM, OPT_PROB_CONFIRMATION, OPT_PROB_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_FREETEXT_PARAM, OPT_OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_LINK.

value.value: select x=count(distinct a.allergy_id) @NEWLINEfrom allergy a, nomenclature n @NEWLINEwhere a.person_id = trigger_personid @NEWLINEand a.active_ind = 1 @NEWLINEand a.reaction_status_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",12025,"ACTIVE")), @NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",12025,"PROPOSED"))) @NEWLINEand n.nomenclature_id = a.substance_nom_id @NEWLINEand n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) @NEWLINEand n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) @NEWLINEand n.source_vocabulary_cd in (value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",400,"ALLERGY")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",400,"MUL.ALGCAT")),@NEWLINEvalue(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",400,"MUL.DRUG")))@NEWLINEand n.source_string_keycap NOT like "*AMIODARONE*" @NEWLINEand ((n.source_identifier in (select macdm.drug_identifier @NEWLINEfrom mltm_alr_category_drug_map macdm @NEWLINEwhere macdm.alr_category_id in (select maccm.alr_category_id @NEWLINEfrom mltm_alr_category_class_map maccm @NEWLINEwhere maccm.class_id in (select mac.class_id @NEWLINEfrom mltm_alr_class mac @NEWLINEwhere mac.class_id = 43)))) @NEWLINEor (n.source_identifier in (select cnvtstring(maccm.alr_category_id) @NEWLINEfrom mltm_alr_category_class_map maccm @NEWLINEwhere maccm.class_id in (select mac.class_id @NEWLINEfrom mltm_alr_class mac @NEWLINEwhere mac.class_id = 43))) @NEWLINEor (n.source_string in ("iodine containing compounds","Contrast Dye (Unknown Type)") @NEWLINEand n.source_vocabulary_cd = value(uar_get_code_by("MEANING",400,"ALLERGY")))) @NEWLINEhead report log_retval = 0 detail if(x > 0) log_retval = 100 endif log_message = build(cnvtstring(x)," Iodine Allergies") @NEWLINEwith nocounter go
